Four people in front of Wheat School
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three women and a man are standing at the steps of a three story brick building.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; Wheat (Tenn.); Wheat School (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The same four people are in photos ES 0660 and ES 0690. The three women are in photo ES 0710.
On front, 5324; Wheat School; 12-13-48. On back, ORO 5324-1
